GenAiFunction.description:
Send in-app notifications to specific users with optional record links.
USAGE GUIDELINES: Notification Parameters: - recipientIds: Up to 2000 18-char user IDs - targetId: Record ID or 000000000000000AAA - title: Max 100 chars, clear action context - body: Plain text, error details or status
Technical Specifications: - Delivery: Real-time push notification - Persistence: Platform events based - Link handling: Record-aware navigation - Queue handling: Ordered delivery - Error recovery: Auto-retry on fail - Recipient validation: Automatic - Accessibility: Respects user settings - Mobile support: Cross-device delivery - Desktop integration: Toast notifications - Click behavior: Context-aware navigation
